Notes

Printed Notes: All songs Mushroom Pillow Publishing. ℗ & © 2010 Mushroom Pillow. Under exclusive license to True Panther Sounds. Made in Subiza. Comes with a download coupon Subiza was written from January to June 2009 in Barcelona. Recorded in July and August 2009 at Montreal Studios (Spain) and mixed at DNA Studios in NY, Autumn 2009. Mastered at The Exchange in December 2009. Management company Artica. Other Notes: Track times are not printed on the release itself and were established using a stopwatch.
